title: FREE UTILITIES and FREE LAUNDRY in Lincoln Square!
posting_body: Unit features eat-in kitchen with stove, refrigerator, and microwave, plus cozy living room and bedrooms.
Near all of your favorite Lincoln Square restaurants, shops, and cafes, plus the Western Brown Line and several bus routes.
Available now and easy to show!
$75 credit/background check per adult (No bankruptcies or evictions accepted – 600 or higher credit scores needed per applicant).
First month’s rent and $300 move-in fee due at lease signing.
1 (only) small pet negotiable for additional fee (no aggressive breeds.)
$40 monthly tenant benefit package* and $100 admin fee due at lease signing.

* Tenant Benefit package includes multiple payment options for rent, 24/7 maintenance line, online portal, furnace filters delivered to tenant’s door (where applicable), free expert home-buying assistance (and a $500 rebate when tenants buy with one of Chicago Style Management’s preferred agents), one late fee or NSF fee waived per year, no annual renewal fee, one-time waiver for missed inspection or maintenance trip charge, tenants’ reward program (powered by Piñata), annual inspections to ensure unit maintenance is up to date, concierge utility setup.

The accuracy of all information, regardless of source, including but not limited to square footage and lot sizes, is deemed reliable but not guaranteed and should be personally verified through personal inspection by an/or with the appropriate professionals.
Lori Dake, an IL Licensed Broker
